1.0.name: micschk/silverstripe-gridfieldsitetreebuttons
1.0.description: Modifies GridFields & GridField detail forms to use standard page edit form (with versioning, history & settings). Simple alternative for versionedgridfield.

suggest.micschk\/silverstripe-excludechildren: Hide subpages from sitetree (manage them from a gridfield instead)
